title: There is a pink deposit that forms in our sinks and the bottom of the shower after a while in the Southport area. I understand that this is common to the area. What is it? WHat causes it? Is it harmful?
text:
It's likely bacteria, and no, it's not harmful -- long as you
don't eat it. Here's a link that will give you all the info about
this..
